subject: Jews and Judaism
Hockey, Ice
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A minor league player, Jason Bailey, sued the Anaheim Ducks in Orange County, Calif., saying that his coaches on the Bakersfield Condors, then a Ducks affiliate, made anti-Semitic remarks and denied him ice time because he is Jewish.
snippet: A minor league player, Jason Bailey, sued the Anaheim Ducks in Orange County, Calif., saying that his coaches on the Bakersfield Condors, then a Ducks affiliate, made anti-Semitic remarks and denied him ice time because he is Jewish.
